00020 /** \file
00021  \brief gps communications
00022  */
00023 
00024 #ifdef HAVE_GPSD
00025 
00026 #include <gps.h>
00027 
00028 struct gps_data_t *opengps(char *server, char *port) {
00029     struct gps_data_t *g = gps_open(server,port);
00030     if(NULL == g)
00031         return NULL;
00032 
00033 #ifdef HAVE_GPSD_V3
00034     gps_stream(g, WATCH_ENABLE|WATCH_NEWSTYLE, NULL);
00035 #else
00036     gps_query(g, "o");
00037 #endif //HAVE_GPSD_V3
00038 
00039     return g;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void closegps(struct gps_data_t *g) {
00043     gps_close(g);
00044 }
00045 
00046 int getgpsposition(struct gps_data_t *g, double *lat, double *lon, double *alt, double *speed, double *course, double *gpstime) {
00047     fd_set fds;
00048     FD_ZERO(&fds);
00049     FD_SET(g->gps_fd, &fds);
00050     struct timeval timeout;
00051     timeout.tv_sec = 0;
00052     timeout.tv_usec = 1;
00053 
00054     int timesround = 0;
00055     int count;
00056     do {
00057         timesround++;
00058         count = select(g->gps_fd + 1, &fds, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00059         if(count > 0) {
00060 #ifdef HAVE_GPSD_V3
00061             gps_poll(g);
00062 #else
00063             gps_query(g, "o");
00064 #endif //HAVE_GPSD_V3
00065         }
00066     } while (count > 0);
00067 
00068     // if(timesround > 1) {
00069     //  printf("Times around gpsd loop: %i\n", timesround);
00070     // }
00071 
00072     if(g->fix.mode < MODE_2D) {
00073         return -1;
00074     }
00075     if(g->fix.mode == MODE_2D) {
00076         *lat = g->fix.latitude;
00077         *lon = g->fix.longitude;
00078         *course = g->fix.track;
00079         *speed = g->fix.speed;
00080         *gpstime = g->fix.time;
00081         return 0;
00082     }
00083     if(g->fix.mode == MODE_3D) {
00084         *lat = g->fix.latitude;
00085         *lon = g->fix.longitude;
00086         *alt = g->fix.altitude;
00087         *course = g->fix.track;
00088         *speed = g->fix.speed;
00089         *gpstime = g->fix.time;
00090         return 1;
00091     }
00092     // Shouldn't be able to get to here...
00093     return -1;
00094 }
00095 
00096 #endif //HAVE_GPSD
